title: The Claiming of Rouge in the Deep Woods
description: Very erotic interpretation of the classic fairy tale of Little Red Riding Hood. Watch a grown-up Rouge go for a stroll in the deep, dark woods and encounter a very horny male pixie, wolf, and huntsman. Explicit, sex story with elements of dubious consent, hypnosis/trance, sleep sex, monster sex, dominant male, submissive female, forced lactation, BDSM, erotica, and spanking.--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
author: Bella Swann
